website_summaries.verdict: We strongly urge setting aside some time for off-gassing, but this mat works well on concrete or hardwood flooring.
pros: Generous dimensions for all types of equipment
Smooth surface is easy to clean
Extremely lightweight, weighing less than 4 pounds Includes limited lifetime warranty
cons: Reports of damage from heavier equipment

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for Peloton bikes, but easy to get a hole in it.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: This mat got a hole in it after only two months of very light use. I guess you get what you pay for! This is a mat I purchased for my Peloton bike (based on other reviews). In my opinion it is waaaayyyy better than the one Peloton offers. I went to the Peloton boutique to compare them both and there’s really no competition as far as I’m concerned. Buy it you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessixa

customer_reviews.title: A decent quality mat for the price
customer_reviews.text: This mat is of reasonably good quality. Could you poke a hole through it? Probably, but I haven't yet. It lays much nicer on my carpet than I thought it would. Definitely cheaper than other bike trainer mats.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this mat under my bike trainer for ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this mat under my bike trainer for about a week and there are already holes in it. I guess that is damage that is not happening to my floor but I thought it would hold up a little longer than one week...
customer_reviews.author: Jessica N. Yovich

customer_reviews.title: Thin, cheap, doesn’t hold up
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it. I bought this mat to use under my bike trainer/bike to protect the floor. I was able to cut a hole in the mat with my cleat the minute I stepped on it, and a second one by the time I was done on my trainer. I only weigh 110 lbs, and my cleats are normal clip-in bike cleats. I’m super bummed it was able to be damaged so easily. I’ll have to purchase a towel to go on top of it so I stop putting holes in the mat and getting through to the floors
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Barely fits underneath a ProForm 9000 and bunches up. Garbage, returned it
customer_reviews.text: This mat is a piece of garbage. I bought it for a ProForm 9000 Treadmill and it barely fit underneath it and constantly bunched up due to folds along the whole mat. It is also thin and cheap feeling. Do yourself a favor and do not buy this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Liptak

customer_reviews.title: Is not the same size as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The mat is nice enough but it’s only 35 inches wide not the 36 advertised. So, it barely fits my treadmill (meaning it’s too narrow and really does not fit). Short changing an inch really degrades this product. If your close like me. Do not buy this mat. You will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: michael smith

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: A good buy! I hate spending more than I need to. This mat was a great price. I put my Peloton bike on it and it fits perfectly with extra room on each end.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Birkhead

customer_reviews.title: Never buy the big brand mats!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not quite as robust as the ridiculously expensive one that my girlfriend bought with her treadmill, but it works perfectly for my bike trainer setup. It has held up nicely and fits perfectly. I put it over carpet, so any heavy equipment will dent it and probably through to the carpet, but I have no complaints with this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Christo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Pelaton
customer_reviews.text: Bought this instead of the expensive pelaton mat for under our bike. Its slip resistant and the perfect amount of squishy for standing on with cycling shoes. Doesnt show sweat stains and seems to not attract dog hair which is a plus. We ended up cutting ours shorter to put our bike closer to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Ball

customer_reviews.title: Product Dimension
customer_reviews.text: The actual width of this product is only 35 1/4 inches, even thought it is presented as being 36 inches wide. Because of this I could not use it and I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Garry2Rs

customer_reviews.title: Non-Slip? Not True.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a mat to keep my treadmill from sliding on a concrete floor. This product had a lot of good ratings and all for nothing because my treadmill continues to slide while in use. The one good thing about the mat is that it helps shield some of the noise. Overall, I am very disappointed that the mat has virtually no grip to prevent sliding.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin R. Tatroe

customer_reviews.title: Clean look.
customer_reviews.text: These worked pretty well and look nice. They are thick enough yet thin if that makes sense. Only issue is one of them tore on a corner fairly easy with a lil bit of pull to it otherwise would have been a 5 star. So be extra careful as they aren't all that durable with regards to the littlest of stress placed on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its pretty thick
customer_reviews.text: I placed it on a carpet and then placed my elliptical on it. The elliptical doesn't slide but the more force I use it makes the mat move a little but that's only because its on carpet. I will get a sizeable piece of wood to place on the carpet then the mat then the elliptical, I'm sure that once I do this nothing will slide at all. Great quality
customer_reviews.author: Aphrodite Teya Rios

customer_reviews.title: fits perfect on tradmill and doesn't slip
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with me using it under our treadmill. Our fits perfectly but if you have a more robust treadmill, it may not fit as ours is a midsize treadmill. No issues with it slipping on our tile floor. I'm happy with the purchase and it;'s a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived exactly as described, well packaged. Item itself provides good cushioning and protection for our floor. Fits under our treadmill perfectly. I really like the folding as it can easily be folded in once the treadmill is in a storage position.
customer_reviews.author: J. Prottsman

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 2 weeks with peloton
customer_reviews.text: It looks like it’s good quality. Was used for peloton. It ripped within the first 2 weeks of having the bike on it. Really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Sturdy Mat
customer_reviews.text: This mat is very sturdy and built to last. It really helps to protect your carpet and allow you to get a good grip before stepping on to your machine. The design is perfect for a home gym with a nice luster to it. I looked around a lot and found this to be the most cost effective mat on the market. Will definitely purchase another for my elliptical machine.
customer_reviews.author: Sharad Patel

customer_reviews.title: ProSource Value
customer_reviews.text: Pro source Matt works as advertised. Long enough for my elliptical (pictured). Looks cool, reasonably priced, and stabilizes my elliptical use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quickly destroyed under normal home gym use!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the mat in mid-December to protect my wood floors from my "wheel-on" bicycle trainer (a Wahoo Kickr). After only 2.5 months of use (approximately 5x per week, 1-2hrs each use) the mat developed several holes and punctures. It nearly rubbed through from contact of the bike-trainer, as well as from a rougher spot on my floor. No discernible reason and no use that one wouldn't expect to be appropriate for a home gym setup. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Iannucci

customer_reviews.title: Soft, weak and only for use on hard floors.
customer_reviews.text: Very thin and weak. I had to use plywood under it for my treadmill when using it on carpet. Use for hard floors only in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D. Nevins

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for under bike trainer where you will be wearing bike cleats!
customer_reviews.text: Received the mat today and placed it under my bike trainer. First time I stepped on mat with bike cleats put a hole right through the mat. Very disappointed with the material of this mat.
customer_reviews.author: John Matt Fourshee

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, bringing folded when shipped makes it easier to lay out. Being 7 ft long is good as well
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, but works better on hard surface. If it’s on carpet, it will sink a little into the carpet. My treadmill belt is VERY low to the ground. It would rub on my carpet and leave marks. This pad protects my carpet. So I would say it works
customer_reviews.author: Robinski64

customer_reviews.title: nice mat for my treadmill
customer_reviews.text: I got this mat for my proform cst 905 treadmill. It is really nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Woodrum

customer_reviews.title: Exercise equipment floor mats.
customer_reviews.text: Building a new house and bought these for the exercise room to put under the treadmill and under my bike while on the trainer. Looks like a good product. I will come back at a latter date after being able to use them one we have moved into the house and leave a review.
customer_reviews.author: Paul n.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Catches all my sweat from the Peloton and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: LynnP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bike mat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Nordic Track and it’s great. My boyfriend has had his for over a year and also has a stationary bike on his. It’s held up. No tearing. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: Inspect your mat the day you get it.
customer_reviews.text: Well I finally unrolled my mat and it is cut/torn. Still seems to work but pretty disappointing. It came in a box in another box so I know it had nothing to do with shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Works great under bike trainer.
customer_reviews.text: Using as a pad for my indoor bicycle trainer and it's working great. Surface does not get slick when using, and doesn't slide around on a smooth floor. Been working great for a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Mutt

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It's certainly not the best exercise mat, but it's more than adequate for the price. If you want a top-of-the-line mat, you need to pay more than this. But I expect you know that already.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Stays Put
customer_reviews.text: I have my bicycle trainer set up in my living room where the mat is. It is very strong and rarely moves. I like the idea of the folding mat because it can be more compact.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Not for peloton - get a thicker mat.
customer_reviews.text: If you are considering this mat for a peloton bike - don’t. It got holes in it after about 6 weeks of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Customer M

customer_reviews.title: Decent mat, a little soft
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mat to go under my bike trainer. It came rolled up really tight, so I had to let it relax a little before I could use it. It's not very thick, and pretty soft and squishy, so I'm a little worried about things still making indentations in the carpet, but it does seem pretty durable and will help keep the carpet clean. And at a third of the price of other mats, so far seems worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Tore right away. Very thin and really not good for a heavy treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Groves

customer_reviews.title: Good mat, works with bike/trainer.
customer_reviews.text: Good mat. Adequate thickness. Use under my road bike and kinetic trainer. Lays flat with no edge rolling. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MM49

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do what I bought it for
customer_reviews.text: It's a good mat, but I bought it to help with static since I have my treadmill on carpet. It doe not reduce the static at all, but the mat seams to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jessa87

customer_reviews.title: Great for a spin bike
customer_reviews.text: I got this mat for my peloton bike and it worked out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer E.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I love this treadmill. I run at least 5 miles a day on it and vary my workout. My son was able to assembler it. I recommend setting it up with a good pad underneath. It’s sturdy and appears well-made. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: zero interest

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping for a bit thicker but it does protect the wood floor. The treadmill weighs 205 lbs so where the legs are - the mat is indented but that is to be expected. It is just wide enough to fit a 20 x 55 treadmill. There is about 2 inches at the top and bottom and about 1/2" on each side with the treadmill centered on the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Great Rowing Machine Mat
customer_reviews.text: I usd to be able to find these kinds of mats at walmart. It works pefect under my rowing machine.
customer_reviews.author: J.J.

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: No complaints or concerns. Using it as a carpet protector under rowing machine. The mat is firm and does not slide on the carpeting.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrod

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive floor protection
customer_reviews.text: These are the least expensive means to protect my hardwood floors from my exercise equipment. I use my 15 year old ones to protect my garage floor.
customer_reviews.author: SLR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Treadmill
customer_reviews.text: Great product, well made, easy to use, cleans easily. Would buy again in a hearbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A really good mat
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my new elliptical machine as it is a shorter version so this matt works well. It is excellent quality. It had a strong smell for a very short time and then was no smell.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Too soft for carpet
customer_reviews.text: I wish this was stiffer. It's for carpet use, some plastic spike, like those for office chairs would be good but no, so giving this a ho-hum rating. Hard floor maybe OK.
customer_reviews.author: bobb

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Works well under my bike trainer. Easy to wipe up and about $15-$20 cheaper than what I could find locally. So far no issues and just as thick as the name brand trainer mat my husband uses.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great value and longer than other brands
customer_reviews.text: Have not had it for long, but it did the job as intended, is longer than I thought and laid flat overnight. Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Missdc71

customer_reviews.title: Carpet Protect
customer_reviews.text: Fit under the treadmill with room to spare. The new smell wore off after one day. Very nice carpet protection.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Fovall

customer_reviews.title: Good mat
customer_reviews.text: This mat works great for protecting my hardwood floors from my dropped dumbells and weight bench wear.
customer_reviews.author: MJM

customer_reviews.title: A bit thin when compressed but does the job. Good product for the $$.
customer_reviews.text: This mat compresses under the weight creating quite thin areas under weighted areas; however, I noticed a substantial amount of noise reduction under our treadmill. Not much noise heard from upstairs while my wife walks early in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my treadmill
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my treadmill. Very thick and protects my vinyl floors from tearing due to the weight of the machine. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: B. Hyman

customer_reviews.title: Thinner then expected
customer_reviews.text: It’s a lot thinner and lighter then I expected. I was worried it was going to tear when I was positioning it under our treadmill. It’s okay for now and will provide some protection to our wood floor I hope!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for ellipticals
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat to go under my elliptical. It fits great and is very sturdy. I just recently moved and the basement carpet was in perfect condition when I lifted up the mat. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Too Flimsy for Treadmill
customer_reviews.text: Mat looks OK, but my treadmill punched holes in it. Buy something more durable if you're planning to put it under a 200-300 lb treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Father Dal

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I placed the treadmill on the mat. I tried to move it and ended up tearing the stupid mat. Don't buy it. Thin and not durable.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret DelVal

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: They look very nice! However, they didn’t stand up to my kittens chewing them up! Ha!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great working mat
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for putting my bicycle repair rack on. It is a real solid grippy material. I couldn't dream of a better mat to work and and wipe clean too.
customer_reviews.author: BrandonSanFran

customer_reviews.title: Great for our new elliptical since we have it on ...
customer_reviews.text: It came rolled up so when I took it out of the packing, I just laid it out for a few hours with items on top and the mat was flat. Great for our new elliptical since we have it on our wood floors. The only complaint is that we ended up with a tear when we were moving the elliptical on top of it. It seems easy to cut through, but it isn't hurting our machine or our floor so it doesn't bother me any.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put under a small treadmill we bought in order to protect our hardwood floors. Great purchase, easy to clean and simple design.
customer_reviews.author: Eyeris

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Stopped my treadmill from walking across the room. Also protects my wood floors
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for treadmills on a carpeted area.
customer_reviews.text: Way too thin and flexible for even a very light treadmill on carpet. Looks to be a good exercise mat though.
customer_reviews.author: 88willow

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Driver put over my fence and my dog tore it up all over my yard. Material was thin and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used for our treadmill
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use under our treadmill and works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A Grider

customer_reviews.title: Working great in that capacity and there are no signs of ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to sit under our treadmill on recently-refinished hardwood floors. Working great in that capacity and there are no signs of damage to the floor below.
customer_reviews.author: MEF

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and size.
customer_reviews.text: Using under stationary bike. Size and material seem great. Durability will be the true test.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: to lite of weight for any thing
customer_reviews.text: lite weight plastic i guess dogs ate it in 10 min . it was gone
customer_reviews.author: clifton h massey

customer_reviews.title: Not for heavy machines.
customer_reviews.text: The equipment cut right into it. Maybe its for lighter machines, definitely not for treadmills / elliptical's. I use it to keep my dumbbells and other light items.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Equipment mat!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and arrived as expected too. Works great to protect carpet and is the perfect length for my schwinn elliptical. Did take about a day or two to get it to stay flat because it curled at the ends due to being rolled.
customer_reviews.author: Chantelle

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly under my treadmill
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect fit and is protecting my floors while I jog in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: kmarie83

customer_reviews.title: Tears easily
customer_reviews.text: Our treadmill has wheels but it still difficult to move. When we put the treadmill on this mat and tried to straighten it out, the mat tore right under the front wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Durable mat
customer_reviews.text: Love the mat! Durable for use under indoor cycle in our basement, looks nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my Peloton Bike. This is a great price and overall a great product!
customer_reviews.author: kristine

customer_reviews.title: Great mat = especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great mat = especially for the price. Completely covers foot print of Kinetic Rock and Roll Trainer and bike with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Dave in Cincinnati

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for under a treadmill. Not exciting but does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and place in our gym! Very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered several of these mats for our gym. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: M. Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Great for home gym
customer_reviews.text: Really good floor mat. I bought two. One for my treadmill and one for the bike trainer. Both work great. The size is large enough that the floor is fully protected under the treadmill and it catches all sweat around the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Jensen

customer_reviews.title: and was very disappointed. First thing I noticed is that my Shimano ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use under an Elite Direto Trainer. I used once, and was very disappointed. First thing I noticed is that my Shimano road cleat punctured the pad when I mounted the bike. Then, while riding, the mat started bunching up. The mat did not have enough grip on the hardwood floor to stay still. Need a material that is stronger, and suitable to for use with a trainer. My ride was only 1 hour, and had to stop twice to un-bunch the mat and move the bike back to where it belonged (moved forward several inches).
customer_reviews.author: S B

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: Seriously smells terrible. Going to try and air it out for a few days - smelled up the entire room.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Yep it works
customer_reviews.text: Works as listed and we were able to cut to size and use it for two pieces of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and thick!
customer_reviews.text: Use it under our treadmill. Nice and thick and food quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Gariety

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. I saw these and wanted my equipment ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. I saw these and wanted my equipment to stay off my carpets. Better quality than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: flyinford

customer_reviews.title: Hope it works
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this because I need to eliminate the sound and vibration from my washing machine so the tenants under me do not hear when I do laundry. I hope it works?
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this to go under my 2 dog crates to keep them from scratching my hard wood floors. Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Tara V.

customer_reviews.title: nice mat good padding.
customer_reviews.text: bought this to use under a piece of exercise equipment. Used it instead for extra padding under a yoga mat
customer_reviews.author: DruAdams81

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality mat for the price. Perfect for our recumbent bike.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Put this under my new pro-form elliptical and it fit great, looks good and seems tough.
customer_reviews.author: bassman0351

customer_reviews.title: Much bigger than I expected.  Much longer so it takes up more floor space than my little manual treadmill.
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than I expected. Much longer so it takes up more floor space than my little manual treadmill. Works fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Overn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Peleton!! Thick enough to hold the peleton and protect the rug. Nice even ride.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect solution to our treadmill sitting on carpet
customer_reviews.author: D.A. F.

customer_reviews.title: Should be alight on a hard surface.
customer_reviews.text: I am using the mat to protect a rug and it's kind of flimsy. Should be alight on a hard surface.
customer_reviews.author: J. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a quality product and a perfect size for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what I would gain by spending more. Seems like a quality product and a perfect size for my bicycle trainer setup.
customer_reviews.author: John Kogle

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price $$
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's going to get the job done. Creating a barrier between my wood floors & the machine. However, it's very thin & not the best quality but it will do. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super durable, purchased it for a treadmill and it has perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Tai

customer_reviews.title: Tried to place under a stepper
customer_reviews.text: It leaves deep marks and probably the machine's feet pierced this mat. I think is made of cheap plastic
customer_reviews.author: Julie P

customer_reviews.title: It works but not very high quality
customer_reviews.text: This product serves its purpose. It protects the floor under my exercise bike. It’s a little cheap but it’s worked so far
customer_reviews.author: cynthia gordon okoon

customer_reviews.title: Very inexpensive and works great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go under my elliptical. Very inexpensive and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure what to expect for the price paid but assembly was easy, bike is very stable and app is easy to use. Fully adjustable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our Peloton bike; cut it down lengthwise a bit has worked great.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Fit to treadmill and value
customer_reviews.text: I believe this product did everything I was needing it to. It fit under the treadmill and it was at a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneka Scott

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! It is what it said it was!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for going under my treadmill! Arrived on time and fit perfectly. Keeps our carpet from getting indentions from the legs of the treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A. Hart

product_meta.title: ProSource Fit Treadmill & Exercise Equipment Mats
feature_bullets: FLOOR PROTECTION - Protects carpets and hard floors from damage from treadmills, elliptical machines, stationary bikes and other heavy exercise equipment
NOISE-REDUCING – Dense mats absorbs vibration, noise and impact caused when exercising on cardio equipment
LARGE SIZE – Both 6.5 ft &7 ft mats are 3 ft wide and will cover the base of most large equipment. Perfect for basements and garages; versatile for benches, weights, racks
EASY TO CLEAN – Low maintenance and simple to clean - smooth material wipes down easily with a damp cloth
DURABLE - Made of high impact, strong, slip-resistant PVC for a long-lasting, durable floor mat; Includes limited lifetime warranty

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
